casebody.data:
DODSON
v.
DUBOSE STEEL and Am. Man. No. 405A03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 5, 2004. Maura K. Gavigan, Erin E. Eveson, for Dubose Steel, Inc. and American Manufacturers Mutual. Dale P. Johnson, Clinton, for Dodson.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th day of December 2003 by Plaintiff to Dismiss the Appeal of One of the Two Named Defendants:

"Motion Dismissed as Moot by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of February 2004."
